title: Cautious Observer
description: We maintain a relationship of measured vigilance, with a modest level of trust (32.11/100) but minimal engagement (0/100 strength). Our interactions appear limited to public welfare matters and basic transactions, suggesting a relationship where I monitor his activities as part of my governance duties while he remains a working-class citizen under my watchful eye. The absence of significant mutual relevancies indicates our spheres of influence rarely intersect beyond the basic oversight expected of the Consiglio over Venice's facchini.
